svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

name="ページ1" id="JFECwEL1uDYYFKoyOX9N"> <mxGraphModel dx="1267" dy="772" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-1" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="830" width="505" x="125" y="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-2" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="260" width="460" x="147.5" y="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-3" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div><span>type Book {</span></div><div><span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: ID!</span><br></span></div><div><span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	title: String</span><br></span></span></div><div><span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">author: String</span></div><div>}</div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div>type Query {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBooks: [Book]</span></div><div>}</div><div><br></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="220" width="430" x="162.5" y="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-16" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FF0000;strokeWidth=2;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="120" x="190" y="232" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="TTNBintbsaN5be80AeF0-18" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1" value="オブジェクトのフィールドに対するリゾルバー" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="60" width="292.5" x="231.25" y="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-3" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="430" width="460" x="147.5" y="480" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-4" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div>const resolvers = {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	Query: {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBooks: () =&gt; {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	//Book全件を取得し返す処理</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	Book: {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: (parent: Object) =&gt; {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return parent.id;</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	title: (</span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">parent: Object</span><span style="white-space: pre;">) =&gt; {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return parent.title;</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">},</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	author: (</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">parent: Object</span><span style="white-space: pre;">) =&gt; {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return parent.author;</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></div><div>}</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="365" width="430" x="162.5" y="490" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-10" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FF0000;strokeWidth=2;dashed=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="131" width="163" x="157" y="199" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-11" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FF0000;strokeWidth=2;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="186" width="230" value="<div>このような処理(リゾルバー)がデフォルトで用意される</div>(prentはリゾルバーが受け取る引数のうちの1つ)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="50" width="410" x="182.5" y="840" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-13" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="スキーマ定義" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="100" x="503" y="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 428px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 40px;
